Uses of Interface
xtc.lang.cpp.Stream

Packages that use Stream
xtc.lang.cpp This package implements the SuperC parsing engine for parsing all of C. 
 

Uses of Stream in xtc.lang.cpp
 

Classes in xtc.lang.cpp that implement Stream
 class CLexerStream
          A stream of tokens from the C lexer.
 class DirectiveParser
          Parses directives into compound tokens.
 class HeaderFileManager
          This class manages the lexing of input files as well as finding headers.
 class Preprocessor
          This class expands macros and processes header files
 class TokenFilter
          A stream that filters out all tokens except for regular and compound tokens.
 

Methods in xtc.lang.cpp that return Stream
 Stream HeaderFileManager.PFile.stream()
          Get the stream of tokens.

          Create a new directive parser stream.
